version_description:
The new FlashAcademy app, the fastest way to learn a new language! Brought to you by FlashSticks, creators of the award-winning language Post-it Notes.

What’s new?

- Hundreds of new 5 minute lessons
- All new quick-fire word games
- Thousands of new Flash Cards
- New graduation challenge
- Entirely new design and learning experience
- Improved Object Translator
- New Premium options (1, 3, 6 & 12 months)

Download FlashAcademy for free on iOS or Android today!

The new FlashAcademy app, the fastest way to learn a new language! Brought to you by FlashSticks, creators of the award-winning language Post-it Notes.

What’s new?

- Hundreds of new 5 minute lessons
- All new quick-fire word games
- Thousands of new Flash Cards
- New graduation challenge
- Entirely new design and learning experience
- Improved Object Translator
- New Premium options (1, 3, 6 & 12 months)

Download Flash Academy for free on iOS or Android today!

* Brand New Word Match Game!
* Add your own avatar profile photo!
* Spelling help in challenges
* All new Professor Flash app icon

Follow us on:
Twitter: @FlashAcademyApp
Snapchat: FlashSticks
Facebook: www.facebook.com/FlashSticks/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/flashsticks/

NEW LISTENING CHALLENGES FOR LESSONS:

We’ve added new ways to test your listening skills inside each lesson.

Listen to the pronunciation and select the correct translation. Good luck!

FlashAcademy now works with iOS 10.0, plus lots of other bugs fixed!

Tweet us anytime: @FlashAcademyApp

What’s New?
> Reduced App size
> New optimisation updates to improve speed and performance
> New grammar features

> Reduced App size
> New optimisation updates to improve speed and performance
> New grammar features

> Bug fixes
> Improved performance
> New look store page
> New Avatars
> New grammar lessons

Follow us on:
Facebook: FlashSticks
Twitter: @FlashSticks
Instagram: @flashsticks
Snapchat: flashsticks

What's new in FlashAcademy version 2.8?

NEW: Test your pronunciation with our speaking challenge integrated into every lesson!
NEW: The Asteroid game is the latest addition to our variety of word games to test and reinforce vocabulary against the clock!
NEW: Easily view leaderboards to compete against friends in just one click!
NEW: lesson logic to ensure all areas are tested equally

Plus bug fixes and performance improvements

NEW GAMES!
Word Wire: Put your memory and spelling skills to the test with our new wire game! Connect the wires against the clock to spell the words correctly.
Dominoes: Improve your translation speed with our fun domino game! Find the domino with the correct translations as quick as you can!
New lesson logic: Premium users can now navigate through the lessons in any way they choose without having to complete the previous lesson first
Bug fixes and performance improvements
•    Bug fixes & performance improvements
• Bug fixes & performance improvements

In this latest version you will find:
2 new games
3 improved games
Better game scoring/rewards
New courses - learn English from Russian, Mandarin, Tamil & Bengali
Loads of bug fixes
Some improvements of the app's performance
A new indicator to show you which categories you have available for offline use
